verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> now these רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> These [are] now the chief אֲבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֑ם <WH3187> and [this is] the genealogy הָעֹלִ֣ים <WH5927> of them that went up עִמִּ֗י <WH5973> in בְּמַלְכ֛וּת <WH4438> in the reign אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥סְתְּא <WH783> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> with me from Babylon ס

מִבְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> Of the sons פִֽינְחָס֙ <WH6372> of Phinehas גֵּֽרְשֹׁ֔ם <WH1647> Gershom ס מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons אִיתָמָ֖ר <WH385> of Ithamar דָּנִיֵּ֑אל <WH1840> Daniel ס מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons דָוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David חַטּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH2407> Hattush ס

מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the sons שְׁכַנְיָ֔ה <WH7935> of Shechaniah ס מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons פַרְעֹ֖שׁ <WH6551> of Pharosh זְכַרְיָ֑ה <WH2148> Zechariah וְעִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> accompanying הִתְיַחֵ֥שׂ <WH3187> and with him were reckoned by genealogy לִזְכָרִ֖ים <WH2145> of the males מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <WH2572> and fifty ס

מִבְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> Of the sons פַּחַ֣ת מוֹאָ֔ב <WH6355> of Pahathmoab אֶלְיְהֽוֹעֵינַ֖י <WH454> Elihoenai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זְרַֽחְיָ֑ה <WH2228> of Zerahiah וְעִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> and with him two hundred הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> Of the sons שְׁכַנְיָ֖ה <WH7935> of Shechaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יַחֲזִיאֵ֑ל <WH3166> of Jahaziel וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> with שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> and with him three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the sons עָדִ֔ין <WH5720> also of Adin עֶ֖בֶד <WH5651> Ebed בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹנָתָ֑ן <WH3129> of Jonathan וְעִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and with him fifty הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And of the sons עֵילָ֔ם <WH5867> of Elam יְשַֽׁעְיָ֖ה <WH3470> Jeshaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲתַלְיָ֑ה <WH6271> of Athaliah וְעִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> and with him seventy הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And of the sons שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <WH8203> of Shephatiah זְבַדְיָ֖ה <WH2069> Zebadiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִֽיכָאֵ֑ל <WH4317> of Michael וְעִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and with him fourscore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the sons יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> of Joab עֹבַדְיָ֖ה <WH5662> Obadiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְחִיאֵ֑ל <WH3171> of Jehiel וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> two מָאתַ֛יִם <WH3967> and with him two hundred וּשְׁמֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> eight עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> And of the sons שְׁלוֹמִ֖ית <WH8019> of Shelomith בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹסִפְיָ֑ה <WH3131> of Josiphiah וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> with מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> and with him an hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <WH8346> and threescore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And of the sons בֵבַ֔י <WH893> of Bebai זְכַרְיָ֖ה <WH2148> Zechariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בֵּבָ֑י <WH893> of Bebai וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> with עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and with him twenty וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <WH8083> and eight הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And of the sons עַזְגָּ֔ד <WH5803> of Azgad יוֹחָנָ֖ן <WH3110> Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַקָּטָ֑ן <WH6997> of Hakkatan וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> with מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> and with him an hundred וַעֲשָׂרָ֖ה <WH6235> and ten הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אֲדֹנִיקָם֮ <WH140> of Adonikam אַחֲרֹנִים֒ <WH314> And of the last וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> those שְׁמוֹתָ֔ם <WH8034> whose names אֱלִיפֶ֖לֶט <WH467> [are] these Eliphelet יְעִיאֵ֣ל <WH3273> Jeiel וּֽשְׁמַעְיָ֑ה <WH8098> and Shemaiah וְעִמָּהֶ֖ם <WH5973> with שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> and with them threescore הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> Of the sons בִגְוַ֖י <WH902> also of Bigvai עוּתַ֣י <WH5793> Uthai [וְזָבוּד כ] (וְזַכּ֑וּר <WH2072> Zabbud ק) וְעִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> and with them seventy הַזְּכָרִֽים׃ <WH2145> males פ

וָֽאֶקְבְּצֵ֗ם <WH6908> And I gathered them together אֶל־ <WH413> at הַנָּהָר֙ <WH5104> to the river הַבָּ֣א <WH935> that runneth אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲוָ֔א <WH163> to Ahava וַנַּחֲנֶ֥ה <WH2583> and there abode we in tents שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> where יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days שְׁלֹשָׁ֑ה <WH7969> three וָאָבִ֤ינָה <WH995> and I viewed בָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people וּבַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> and the priests וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> there none of the sons לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> of Levi לֹא־ <WH3808> did not מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> and found שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֡ה <WH7971> Then sent לֶאֱלִיעֶ֡זֶר <WH461> I for Eliezer לַאֲרִיאֵ֡ל <WH740> for Ariel לִֽ֠שְׁמַעְיָה <WH8098> for Shemaiah וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֨ן <WH494> and for Elnathan וּלְיָרִ֜יב <WH3402> and for Jarib וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֧ן <WH494> and for Elnathan וּלְנָתָ֛ן <WH5416> and for Nathan וְלִזְכַרְיָ֥ה <WH2148> and for Zechariah וְלִמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> and for Meshullam רָאשִׁ֑ים <WH7218> chief men וּלְיוֹיָרִ֥יב <WH3114> also for Joiarib וּלְאֶלְנָתָ֖ן <WH494> and for Elnathan מְבִינִֽים׃ <WH995> men of understanding

[וָאֹוצִאָה כ] (וָאֲצַוֶּ֤ה <WH3318> after ק) אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> and אִדּ֣וֹ <WH112> unto Iddo הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> the chief בְּכָסִפְיָ֖א <WH3703> Casiphia הַמָּק֑וֹם <WH4725> at the place וָאָשִׂימָה֩ <WH7760> appoint בְּפִיהֶ֨ם <WH6310> according דְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> them what לְ֠דַבֵּר <WH1696> they should say אֶל־ <WH413> to אִדּ֨וֹ <WH112> unto Iddo אָחִ֤יו <WH251> [and] to his brethren [הַנְּתוּנִים כ] (הַנְּתִינִים֙ <WH5411> Nethinims ק) בְּכָסִפְיָ֣א <WH3703> Casiphia הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> at the place לְהָֽבִיא־ <WH935> that they should bring לָ֥נוּ מְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <WH8334> unto us ministers לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> for the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God

וַיָּבִ֨יאּוּ <WH935> upon us they brought לָ֜נוּ כְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand אֱלֹהֵ֨ינוּ <WH430> of our God הַטּוֹבָ֤ה <WH2896> And by the good עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> and אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> us a man שֶׂ֔כֶל <WH7922> of understanding מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons מַחְלִ֔י <WH4249> of Mahli בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> of Levi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְשֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֛ה <WH8274> and Sherebiah וּבָנָ֥יו <WH1121> with his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> and his brethren שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen

וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <WH2811> And Hashabiah וְאִתּ֥וֹ <WH854> for יְשַֽׁעְיָ֖ה <WH3470> and with him Jeshaiah מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons מְרָרִ֑י <WH4847> of Merari אֶחָ֥יו <WH251> his brethren וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> and their sons עֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> twenty ס

וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הַנְּתִינִ֗ים <WH5411> Also of the Nethinims שֶׁנָּתַ֨ן <WH5414> had appointed דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> whom David וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> and the princes לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> for the service הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> of the Levites נְתִינִ֖ים <WH5411> Nethinims מָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> two hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֑ים <WH6242> and twenty כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> all נִקְּב֥וּ <WH5344> all of them were expressed בְשֵׁמֽוֹת׃ <WH8034> by name

וָאֶקְרָ֨א <WH7121> Then I proclaimed שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there צוֹם֙ <WH6685> a fast עַל־ <WH5921> at הַנָּהָ֣ר <WH5104> there at the river אַהֲוָ֔א <WH163> of Ahava לְהִתְעַנּ֖וֹת <WH6031> that we might afflict לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> ourselves before אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <WH1245> to seek מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> at דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> way יְשָׁרָ֔ה <WH3477> of him a right לָ֥נוּ וּלְטַפֵּ֖נוּ <WH2945> for us and for our little ones וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all רְכוּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <WH7399> and for all our substance

כִּ֣י <WH3588> because בֹ֗שְׁתִּי <WH954> For I was ashamed לִשְׁא֤וֹל <WH7592> to require מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king חַ֣יִל <WH2428> a band of soldiers וּפָרָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> and horsemen לְעָזְרֵ֥נוּ <WH5826> to help מֵאוֹיֵ֖ב <WH341> us against the enemy בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אָמַ֨רְנוּ <WH559> because we had spoken לַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying יַד־ <WH3027> The hand אֱלֹהֵ֤ינוּ <WH430> of our God עַל־ <WH5921> are against כָּל־ <WH3605> to all מְבַקְשָׁיו֙ <WH1245> that seek לְטוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> [is] upon all them for good וְעֻזּ֣וֹ <WH5797> him but his power וְאַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> and his wrath עַ֖ל <WH5921> are against כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֹזְבָֽיו׃ <WH5800> [is] against all them that forsake

וַנָּצ֛וּמָה <WH6684> So we fasted וַנְּבַקְשָׁ֥ה <WH1245> and besought מֵאֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God עַל־ <WH5921> concerning זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise וַיֵּעָתֵ֖ר <WH6279> for this and he was intreated לָֽנוּ׃

וָאַבְדִּ֛ילָה <WH914> Then I separated מִשָּׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> of the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of the priests שְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֑ר <WH6240> ten לְשֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֣ה <WH8274> Sherebiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <WH2811> Hashabiah וְעִמָּהֶ֥ם <WH5973> with מֵאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> of their brethren עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <WH6235> and ten

[וָאֶשְׁקֹולָה כ] (וָאֶשְׁקֳלָ֣ה <WH8254> pay ק) לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> unto them the silver וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> and the gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֵּלִ֑ים <WH3627> and the vessels תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> [even] the offering בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> of our God הַהֵרִ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7311> had offered הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> which the king וְיֹעֲצָ֣יו <WH3289> and his counsellors וְשָׂרָ֔יו <WH8269> and his lords וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and all Israel הַנִּמְצָאִֽים׃ <WH4672> [there] present

וָאֶשְׁקֲלָ֨ה <WH8254> I even weighed עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָדָ֜ם <WH3027> unto their hand כֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> of silver כִּכָּרִים֙ <WH3603> talents שֵֽׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֔ים <WH2572> and fifty וּכְלֵי־ <WH3627> vessels כֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> and silver מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred לְכִכָּרִ֑ים <WH3603> talents זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> [and] of gold מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred כִכָּֽר׃ <WH3603> talents

וּכְפֹרֵ֤י <WH3713> basons זָהָב֙ <WH2091> of gold עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> Also twenty לַאֲדַרְכֹנִ֖ים <WH150> drams אָ֑לֶף <WH505> of a thousand וּכְלֵ֨י <WH3627> vessels נְחֹ֜שֶׁת <WH5178> copper מֻצְהָ֤ב <WH6668> shiny טוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> of fine שְׁנַ֔יִם <WH8147> and two חֲמוּדֹ֖ת <WH2532> precious כַּזָּהָֽב׃ <WH2091> as gold

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <WH559> And I said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> about אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> You קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> unto them Ye [are] holy לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְהַכֵּלִ֖ים <WH3627> the vessels קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [are] holy וְהַכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> also and the silver וְהַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> and the gold נְדָבָ֔ה <WH5071> [are] a freewill offering לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> of your fathers

שִׁקְד֣וּ <WH8245> Watch וְשִׁמְר֗וּ <WH8104> ye and keep עַֽד־ <WH5704> until תִּשְׁקְל֡וּ <WH8254> [them] until ye weigh לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> [them] before שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֛ם <WH3881> and the Levites וְשָׂרֵֽי־ <WH8269> and chief הָאָב֥וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem הַלִּשְׁכ֖וֹת <WH3957> in the chambers בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְקִבְּלוּ֙ <WH6901> So took הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites מִשְׁקַ֛ל <WH4948> the weight הַכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> of the silver וְהַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> and the gold וְהַכֵּלִ֑ים <WH3627> and the vessels לְהָבִ֥יא <WH935> to bring לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> [them] to Jerusalem לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God פ

וַֽנִּסְעָ֞ה <WH5265> Then we departed מִנְּהַ֣ר <WH5104> from the river אַֽהֲוָ֗א <WH163> of Ahava בִּשְׁנֵ֤ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> ten לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> [day] of the first לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> to go יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem וְיַד־ <WH3027> and the hand אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> of our God הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> become עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> was over וַיַּ֨צִּילֵ֔נוּ <WH5337> was upon us and he delivered מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> us from the hand אוֹיֵ֛ב <WH341> of the enemy וְאוֹרֵ֖ב <WH693> and of such as lay in wait עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> by the way
וַנָּב֖וֹא <WH935> And we came יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וַנֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and abode שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> there three

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הָרְבִיעִ֡י <WH7243> Now on the fourth נִשְׁקַ֣ל <WH8254> weighed הַכֶּסֶף֩ <WH3701> was the silver וְהַזָּהָ֨ב <WH2091> and the gold וְהַכֵּלִ֜ים <WH3627> and the vessels בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> of our God עַ֠ל <WH5921> into יַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מְרֵמ֤וֹת <WH4822> of Meremoth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֽוּרִיָּה֙ <WH223> of Uriah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְעִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> and with אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> and with him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פִּֽינְחָ֑ס <WH6372> of Phinehas וְעִמָּהֶ֞ם <WH5973> with יוֹזָבָ֧ד <WH3107> and with them [was] Jozabad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֵשׁ֛וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua וְנֽוֹעַדְיָ֥ה <WH5129> and Noadiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בִּנּ֖וּי <WH1131> of Binnui הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> Levites

בְּמִסְפָּ֥ר <WH4557> By number בְּמִשְׁקָ֖ל <WH4948> [and] by weight לַכֹּ֑ל <WH3605> Everything וַיִּכָּתֵ֥ב <WH3789> was written כָּֽל־ <WH3605> and all הַמִּשְׁקָ֖ל <WH4948> of every one and all the weight בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he פ

הַ֠בָּאִים <WH935> which were come out מֵֽהַשְּׁבִ֨י <WH7628> of the captivity בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> [Also] the children הַגּוֹלָ֜ה <WH1473> of those that had been carried away הִקְרִ֥יבוּ <WH7126> offered עֹל֣וֹת ׀ <WH5930> burnt offerings לֵאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel פָּרִ֨ים <WH6499> bullocks שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֤ר <WH6240> ten עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> for all Israel אֵילִ֣ים ׀ <WH352> rams תִּשְׁעִ֣ים <WH8673> ninety וְשִׁשָּׁ֗ה <WH8337> and six כְּבָשִׂים֙ <WH3532> lambs שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> seventy וְשִׁבְעָ֔ה <WH7651> and seven צְפִירֵ֥י <WH6842> he goats חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering שְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֑ר <WH6240> ten הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all עוֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> all [this was] a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ

וַֽיִּתְּנ֣וּ ׀ <WH5414> And they delivered אֶת־ <WH853> דָּתֵ֣י <WH1881> commissions הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's לַאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנֵי֙ <WH323> lieutenants הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king's וּפַחֲו֖וֹת <WH6346> and to the governors עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> on this side הַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> the river וְנִשְּׂא֥וּ <WH5375> and they furthered אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> and the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God ס
